CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 13, 1946, pg. 9, reads: "Lovely Ladies - Three of the lovely models in sixth annual Beauty Shop Owners' Fashion Show [illegible] ...those shown above, left to right: Leanora Worthington, Nanette Frazier and Hazel Betters. - Harris Photo." Portion of accompanying article by Toki Schalk Johnson reads: "Swank Styles Shown by Pretty Models Sixth Annual Beauty Shop Revue - The sixth annual Fashion Revue sponsored by the energetic members of the Beauty Shop Owners' Association was an intriguing evening of style and beauty. Emceed by Mary B. McEinheimer ... the affair was held Tuesday evening in Schenley High School auditorium ... Outstanding were Gloria Grate wearing a cocoa brown [illegible] piece suit, with a swirly feather hat (the suit belonged to [ill.] chairman, Elma P. Walls) with accessories to match... "
TitMainTitle: Gloria Golden Grate modeling suit, fur stole, and feathered hat, on stage with potted plants for sixth annual Beauty Shop Owners Fashion Show, Schenley High School auditorium
